feed.title: Google Cloud: Apigee hybrid
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Apigee hybrid

entry.id: urn:github:multani:gcp-changelog:apigee-hybrid:2025-09-24:apigee operator for kubernetes for apigee hybrid (preview):0
entry.content:
On September 24, 2025 we released the Apigee Operator for Kubernetes for Apigee Hybrid 1.15.0 and newer.

The Apigee Operator for Kubernetes allows you to perform API management tasks, such as defining API products and operations, using Kubernetes tools. This preview release allows you to integrate this capability with your Apigee hybrid (v1.15.0 or newer) installation.

For more information, see:

  • Apigee Operator for Kubernetes overview
  • Install the Apigee Operator for Kubernetes for Apigee hybrid
entry.summary: Announcing the preview release of the Apigee Operator for Kubernetes, enabling API management tasks on Kubernetes for Apigee hybrid 1.15.0 and newer.
entry.title: Apigee Operator for Kubernetes for Apigee Hybrid (Preview): Apigee Operator for Kubernetes (Preview)

entry.content:
On July 9, 2025 we released an updated version of the Apigee hybrid software, 1.13.4.

  • For information on upgrading, see Upgrading Apigee hybrid to version 1.13.
  • For information on new installations, see The big picture.

Note: if you are upgrading to Apigee hybrid version 1.13.4 from version 1.13.2 or earlier, see APPENDIX: Validate policies after upgrade to 1.13.3 or later for steps to address stricter class instantiation checks introduced in version 1.13.3. Note: This is a patch release: The container images used in patch releases are integrated with the Apigee hybrid Helm charts. Upgrading to a patch via the Helm chart automatically updates the images. No manual image changes are typically needed. For information on container image support in Apigee hybrid releases, see Apigee release process.
entry.summary: A new version of Apigee hybrid, 1.13.4, was released on July 9, 2025. The release includes important updates for upgrading and new installations. Users upgrading from version 1.13.2 or earlier should follow specific steps to validate policies. This patch release is integrated with Helm charts for automatic image updates.
entry.title: hybrid v1.13.4: Apigee hybrid 1.13.4 released

entry.content: | Bug ID | Description | | --- | --- | | 420675540 | Fixed Cassandra based replication for runtime contracts in synchronizer. | | 401746333 | Fixed a java.lang.ClassCircularityError that could occur in Java Callouts due to an issue with the class loading mechanism. | | 382565315 | A memory leak within the Security Policy has been addressed, improving system stability. | | 375360455 | Updated apigee-runtime drain timeout to 300s to fix connection termination issue during pod termination. |
entry.summary: This release addresses several key issues: a fix for Cassandra-based replication in the synchronizer, resolution of a `java.lang.ClassCircularityError` in Java Callouts, a memory leak in Security Policy, and an update to the apigee-runtime drain timeout to prevent connection termination problems.
entry.title: Fixed: Bug Fixes

entry.content: | Bug ID | Description | | --- | --- | | 396944778 | Security fixes for apigee-synchronizer. This addresses the following vulnerabilities: * CVE-2025-25193 * CVE-2025-24970 * CVE-2025-23184 * CVE-2024-47554 | | 392934392 | Security fixes for apigee-logger. | | N/A | Security fixes for apigee-mart-server. This addresses the following vulnerability: * CVE-2024-20952 | | N/A | Security fixes for apigee-mint-task-scheduler. This addresses the following vulnerability: * CVE-2024-20952 | | N/A | Security fixes for apigee-redis. This addresses the following vulnerabilities: * CVE-2022-24834 * CVE-2022-24735 | | N/A | Security fixes for apigee-runtime. This addresses the following vulnerability: * CVE-2024-20952 | | N/A | Security fixes for apigee-synchronizer. This addresses the following vulnerability: * CVE-2024-20952 | | N/A | Security fixes for vault. This addresses the following vulnerability: * CVE-2025-0377 |
entry.summary: This security update addresses vulnerabilities in apigee-synchronizer, apigee-logger, apigee-mart-server, apigee-mint-task-scheduler, apigee-redis, apigee-runtime, and vault. Key vulnerabilities include CVE-2025-25193, CVE-2025-24970, CVE-2025-23184, CVE-2024-47554, CVE-2024-20952, CVE-2022-24834, CVE-2022-24735, and CVE-2025-0377.
entry.title: Security: Security fixes for Apigee components

entry.content:
On June 4, 2025 we released an updated version of the Apigee hybrid software, 1.15.0.

  • For information on upgrading, see Upgrading Apigee hybrid to version 1.15.
  • For information on new installations, see The big picture.

Note: This is a minor release: The container images used in minor releases are integrated with the Apigee hybrid Helm charts. Upgrading to a minor via the Helm chart automatically updates the images. No manual image changes are typically needed. For information on container image support in Apigee hybrid releases, see Apigee release process.
entry.summary: A new update for Apigee hybrid, version 1.15.0, was released on June 4, 2025. This minor release includes updates to container images integrated with the Apigee hybrid Helm charts, simplifying the upgrade process.
entry.title: hybrid v1.15.0: Apigee hybrid 1.15.0 released

entry.content:
Large message payload support in Apigee hybrid

Apigee now supports message payloads up to 30MB. You configure support for large message payloads in Apigee hybrid for individual environments or for your whole installation. See Configure large message payload support in Apigee hybrid.
entry.summary: Apigee hybrid now supports message payloads up to 30MB. This can be configured for individual environments or the entire installation.
entry.title: Feature: Large message payload support in Apigee hybrid

entry.content: | Bug ID | Description | | --- | --- | | 412324617 | Fixed issue where Runtime container could spin at 100% cpu limit. (Fixed in v1.14.2) | | 399447688 | API proxy deployment could become stuck in PROGRESSING state. (Fixed in v1.14.2) | | 396886110 | Fixed a bug where the HPA max replicas could be lower than min. (Fixed in v1.14.1) | | 413708061, 396571537 | Rotating Cassandra credentials in Kubernetes secrets fixed for Multi-region deployments. (Fixed in v1.14.2) | | 392547038 | Add Helm chart template checks for non-existent environments and virtualhosts. (Fixed in v1.14.1) | | 391861216 | Restore for Google Cloud Platform and HYBRID Cloud Providers no longer affects system keyspaces. This fixes Known Issue 391861216. (Fixed in v1.14.1) | | 390258745, 388608440 | Any left over Cassandra snapshots are automatically removed. This fixes known issue 388608440. (Fixed in v1.14.1) | | 384937220 | Fixed ApigeeRoute name collision on internal chaining gateway for Enhanced Proxy Limits. (Fixed in v1.14.2) | | 383441226 | Added the following metrics configuration properties: * metrics.adapter.resources.limits.cpu * metrics.adapter.resources.limits.memory * metrics.adapter.resources.requests.cpu * metrics.adapter.resources.requests.memory * metrics.prometheus.resources.limits.cpu * metrics.prometheus.resources.limits.memory * metrics.prometheus.resources.requests.cpu * metrics.prometheus.resources.requests.memory (Fixed in v1.14.1) | | 368155212 | Auto Cassandra secret rotation could fail when Enhanced per-environment proxy limits are enabled. (Fixed in v1.14.2) | | 367681534 | Tagging apigee-stackdriver-prometheus-sidecar to prevent removal from customer repos after 2 years due to infrequent updates. (Fixed in 1.14.0-hotfix.1) |
entry.summary: This release includes several fixes, such as resolving Runtime container CPU usage issues, preventing API proxy deployment hangs, correcting Horizontal Pod Autoscaler replica counts, and fixing Cassandra credential rotation for multi-region setups. It also addresses issues with system key spaces during restore operations and ensures automatic removal of old Cassandra snapshots. Additionally, it resolves `ApigeeRoute` name collisions and improves Helm chart checks.
entry.title: Fixed: Various fixes and improvements

entry.summary: This release includes security fixes for various components, including apigee-asm-ingress, apigee-asm-istiod, apigee-connect-agent, apigee-envoy, apigee-fluent-bit, apigee-hybrid-cassandra, apigee-hybrid-cassandra-client, apigee-kube-rbac-proxy, apigee-mart-server, apigee-operators, apigee-prom-prometheus, apigee-prometheus-adapter, apigee-redis, apigee-runtime, apigee-stackdriver-logging-agent, apigee-synchronizer, apigee-watcher, cert-manager-cainjector, cert-manager-controller, cert-manager-webhook, and vault. These fixes address multiple CVEs, enhancing the overall security of the system.
entry.title: Security: Security Fixes Released for Multiple Components

entry.summary: This release includes security fixes for various Apigee components, including apigee-watcher, apigee-udca, apigee-cassandra-backup-utility, apigee-cassandra-client, apigee-hybrid-cassandra, PythonScript policy, apigee-stackdriver-logging-agent, apigee-redis, apigee-prometheus-adapter, apigee-operators, apigee-open-telemetry-collector, apigee-mint-task-scheduler, apigee-kube-rbac-proxy, and apigee-fluent-bit. These fixes address multiple CVEs to enhance the security of your Apigee hybrid deployment.
entry.title: Security: Security Updates for Apigee Components

entry.content: On May 29, 2025 we announced the shutdown schedule for the Apigee Classic UI.
entry.summary: The Apigee Classic UI will be shut down starting May 29, 2025. This announcement details the schedule for this transition.
entry.title: Announcement: Apigee Classic UI Shutdown

entry.content:
The Apigee Classic UI will be shutdown as of August 29, 2025.

This is the final phase of moving Apigee to the Google Cloud console. Apigee in the Google Cloud console gives you the ability to manage all of your Apigee functionality in one place.

To prepare for the shutdown of the Apigee Classic UI, familiarize yourself with the new Apigee UI in Google Cloud console by reviewing UI overview.

See Apigee Classic UI shutdown for details on shutdown dates and exception request.
entry.summary: The Apigee Classic UI will be shut down on August 29, 2025, marking the final step in integrating Apigee into the Google Cloud console. Users are encouraged to familiarize themselves with the new interface to manage all Apigee functionalities in one location.
entry.title: Deprecated: Apigee Classic UI Deprecation
